output.reasoning: To determine if patient 11843648 was diagnosed with pseudomonas (aeruginosa) (mallei) (pseudomallei) as the cause of diseases classified elsewhere until 1 year ago, we need to check the DIAGNOSES_ICD table for any entries with the relevant ICD codes for pseudomonas infections. We will join this with the D_ICD_DIAGNOSES table to filter by the long_title containing 'pseudomonas'. The time constraint is until 1 year ago from the current time, which is 2104-12-31 23:59:59, given the current time is set to 2105-12-31 23:59:59.
output.SQL: SELECT di.subject_id, di.icd_code, did.long_title, di.charttime FROM DIAGNOSES_ICD di JOIN D_ICD_DIAGNOSES did ON di.icd_code = did.icd_code WHERE di.subject_id = 11843648 AND did.long_title LIKE '%pseudomonas%' AND di.charttime <= '2104-12-31 23:59:59'
